EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-04-24 Intro to Kubernetes.ES-4/24 Webinar Intro to Kubernetes - Marketo
EmailTemplate.subject: Are You Getting The Full Benefits Of Kubernetes?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Did you know that the use of container platforms like Kubernetes is expected to grow by 165% in the next 18 months <[[https://turbonomic.com/state-of-multicloud/]]>? As the platform for building platforms, it’s important to understand its native capabilities.
Join our webinar, "Introduction to Kubernetes for Multicloud Scale," <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> on Wednesday, April 24th at 11 am ET to learn how to get the full benefits of Kubernetes!
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>
Topics we'll cover during this one-hour session include:
- What is Kubernetes - Why so many leading organizations are adopting it - Key problems you can solve with Kubernetes - and more!
I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-kubernetes-multicloud/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
